title: Settings
languageChangedDesc: Changed to {language}. The app will restart to apply changes.
pushNotificationsDesc: Get notified when your partner sends a message
darkModeDesc: Use dark interface to protect your eyes
readReceiptsDesc: Let your partner know when you read messages
deleteAccountDesc: Completely delete account and all data
footerText: Only You is designed for two people who want complete privacy in communication. Your messages are encrypted and stored only on your device.
clearAllConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete all your messages. This action cannot be undone.
exportedDesc: Your messages have been exported to your device.
backupCreatedDesc: Your messages have been backed up securely.
appLockDesc: Use biometrics or passcode to protect the app
deleteConfirmDesc: This will completely delete your account and all related data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteConfirmFinalDesc: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account permanently? This action CANNOT be undone.
accountDeletedDesc: Your account has been permanently deleted. Thank you for using Only You.
deleteAccountFailed: Could not delete account. Please try again.
